          <title>
            <string language="es">Los orígenes</string>
            <string language="en">The origins</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Ursprung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les origines</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As origens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le origini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προέλευση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Breve texto explicativo de los orígenes de Roma con actividad, imágenes ilustrativas, ventanas desplegables y enlaces al glosario.</string>
            <string language="en">Brief text on the origins of Rome including an activity, illustrative images, pop up windows and links to a glossary.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">orígenes</string>
            <string language="en">origins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Roma</string>
            <string language="en">Rome</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurzer Text auf den Ursprung von Rom 
einschließlich eine Aktivität, illustrative Bilder, knallen oben 
Fenster und Links zu einem Glossar.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le bref texte sur les origines de Rome comprenant
une activité, images d'illustration, sautent vers le haut des 
fenêtres et des liens à un glossaire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O texto breve nas origens de Roma including uma 
atividade, imagens ilustrativas, estala acima janelas e ligações a 
um glossário.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il breve testo sulle origini di Roma compreso 
un'attività, immagini illustrative, schiocca in su le finestre ed i 
collegamenti ad un glossario.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το συνοπτικό κείμενο στην προέλευση της Ρώμης 
συμπεριλαμβανομένης μιας δραστηριότητας, επεξηγηματικές εικόνες, 
σκάει επάνω τα Windows και τις συνδέσεις με ένα γλωσσάρι.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Rom</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rome</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Roma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προέλευση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρώμη</string>
          </keyword>
